alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued August 22 at 2:11AM PDT until August 22 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...San Diego County Deserts County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Outflow from thunderstorms over Imperial County will produce easterly wind gusts to 40 mph and areas of blowing dust with visibility of 1 mile or less at times. Visibility will gradually improve early this morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
